attributes.action: Apply for another referendum. Due to the lies provided prior to the brexit vote
attributes.additional_details: Ministers stating the financial loss to the UK. Reduction on security to protect our country. Money wasted on agreeing a deal that wasn't promised by the UK citizens. Border security will weaken. UK banks have confirmed the impact if this happens, so please accept my application to push for another referendum. Now that there is clear evidence of the financial loss to everyone in the UK
attributes.background: Due to the uncertainty and the false information provided to UK citizens prior to the Brexit vote. I feel that this vote was totally unfair to the general public and the financial loss highlighted by the government. No clarification was provided by the leave government.
